title: Panama Jack Sunscreen Lip Balm - SPF 45, Flavor Pack, Broad Spectrum UVA-UVB Sunscreen Protection, Prevents & Soothes Dry, Chapped Lips (Dreamsicle/Vanilla)
features: MULTI-ACTION FORMULA: Our Panama Jack Lip Balm flavors are so good that it can be hard to choose just one. Now, you wonâ€™t have to with our new Lip Balm Flavor Pack! Each Flavor Pack includes all four of our incredible flavors: 1 Vanilla, 1 Mango, 1 Dreamsicle and 1 Tropical. Our Panama Jack SPF 45 sunscreen lip balm is non-waxy/sticky, goes on smooth, offers broad spectrum UVA/UVB sun protection, and tastes amazing

SOOTHES DRY, CHAPPED LIPS: Helping to prevent sunburn, our lip balms are perfect for sensitive skin or those that have a tendency to get fever or sun blisters. Designed in a Cruelty Free with NO animal testing formula, our lip balms DO NOT contain: Gluten, Parabens, PABA, Oxybenzone, Propylene, Glycol, Retinyl, Palmitate, BHT, PBA, or harmful Synthetic Preservatives.
BROAD SPECTRUM SUNSCREEN: With SPF 45 (Sun Protection Factor), this Panama Jack UVA-UVB sunscreen lip balm is the ultimate all season chapped lip stick.
0.15 OZ (4.25g) easy-to-grip consumer-friendly bottle with adjustable dispensing knob. Use often and reapply after toweling dry, prolonged swimming, or excessive perspiration.

SUN PROTECTION MEASURES: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including wearing hats and sunglasses.
description: MULTI-ACTION FORMULA: Having trouble deciding which Panama Jack Lip Balm flavor is right for you? No problem, try a few!
